transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Pawan ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji haan bol raha hu.
Customer: Ji sir good morning, mai Riya bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se. Sir baat hui thi na services ke regarding?
Customer: Ji sir hum baithe hai, hum karte hai lekin mai aapko karta hu mai.
Executive: Mai kab collect kar lu aapko?
Customer: 15 tarikh ke andar mai aapko karta hu WhatsApp pe message. Thoda discuss kar lete hai.
Executive: Okay sir, okay kar lijiye aap.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to know when to collect payment.



Resolution:

- Customer will message on WhatsApp by 15th.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, services, follow up
